APEX.JK.summary: PT Apexindo Pratama Duta Tbk provides onshore and offshore drilling services for oil and gas, geothermal, and coal bed methane industries in Indonesia and internationally. The company has a fleet of six offshore rigs that include 4 swamp barges and 2 jack-up rigs; and eight onshore rigs, as well as one floating production storage and offloading vessel. It serves international and domestic energy companies. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Apexindo Pratama Duta Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Aserra Capital.
